# Case multi-chunk-single-runtime: Step 1

## Changed Files
- file.js

## Asset Files

- Bundle: b.js
- Bundle: main.js
- Bundle: main_async_js.chunk.CURRENT_HASH.js
- Bundle: runtime.js
- Manifest: runtime.LAST_HASH.hot-update.json, size: 46
- Update: a.LAST_HASH.hot-update.js, size: 94
- Update: b.LAST_HASH.hot-update.js, size: 94

- Update: runtime.LAST_HASH.hot-update.js, size: 204

## Manifest

### runtime.LAST_HASH.hot-update.json

```json
{"c":["a","b","main","runtime"],"r":[],"m":[]}
```

```js
module.exports = 2;
}),

});
```

### runtime.LAST_HASH.hot-update.js

#### Changed Modules


#### Changed Runtime Modules
- webpack/runtime/get_full_hash

#### Changed Content
```js
self["webpackHotUpdate"]('runtime', {

},function(__webpack_require__) {
// webpack/runtime/get_full_hash
!function() {
__webpack_require__.h = function () {
	return "CURRENT_HASH";
};

}();

}
);
```
